ygData.subject: The duel
ygData.msgSnippet: At another portion of the chivtron battle, Zero flips backwards holding onto his beam sabre tightly as his wings enclose around him. A moment later a buster

Subject: The duel
Message-ID: <9ir107+b5mm@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 3801
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Legendarynemasis@...

At another portion of the chivtron battle, Zero flips backwards 
holding onto his beam sabre tightly as his wings enclose around him. 
A moment later a buster sheild richochets off of them despite cuttig 
into the metal and then returns to methos's hand as he flys towards 
Zero. He spins around in the air quickly and attempts to aslsh into 
Zeros wings withhis Double-bladed scythe, however Zero is quick to 
react and counters this by opening his wings and grabbing his sabre 
with both hands he slams it into one of the blades of energy of the 
beam scythe stopping it.

Zero: "I wont forgive you for what you did back on cybertron!"

Methos smirks before he lets go of the scythe as he drops to one knee 
and then sweeps Zero making him fall onto his back. And as Zero mhits 
the ground Methos leaps up into the air grabbing his scythe before it 
falls, he spins in the air and a somersault and then lands by Zero's 
head and slams the blade down at his neck, but Zero quickly roll sout 
of the way before slamming the end of his energy sabre into the back 
of Methos's leg making him fall to one knee. Both bots then spring up 
to their feet and turn to face each other, each gripping thier 
weapons tightly.

Methos: "I was following orders. It had to be done... he would have 
understood..."

Zero's optics glow brightly at these words and he rushes at Methos 
and slashes at him repadily.

Zero: "That is no excuse for what you did!!"

Methos tries his best to block the repeated slashes, using his buster 
shields and and scythe to stop each blow before both shields crack 
and explode. Without any shield to protect Methos anylong a few of 
Zeros last quick slashes connect with his body creating deep gashes 
in his body. Electricity flys from each gash as Methos clutches one 
in his side. He stands and looks to Zero enraged before he quickly 
lunges at him and slashes him quickly from the side of his ghut all 
the way up his chest. Zero's optic widen at this as he cluthes his 
chest as electricity surrounds his hand. He looks to Methos 
questioningly. Methos jnust looks to Zero with dead optics as he 
cluthes a gut wound his body heaving with each intake of oxygen and 
other gases. He then raises his Scythe above his head about to lay 
the killing blow to Zero before Zero flys forward and slams the blade 
of his scythe into the center of Methos's stomach all the way, the 
blade shooting out of his back. Methos twitches for a moment before 
his hands let go of the scythe in his hand which falls to the ground 
infront of him and deactivates. A second later he falls to his knees 
and then onto his face and stomach. Zero gets up and grabs the back 
of Methos's neck, his body limp.

Zero: "These people here... they will imprison you... until we return 
to what cybertron we have left and you are tried... I will never let 
you out of my sight."

Zero smiles and prepares to drag away when a red glint catchesn his 
eye, the glint being the corner of Methos's very much active optics 
and before Zero can react, Methos turns to the side and a wing energy 
blade flys up and drives itself into Zeros side cutting into him 
deeply. Zero looks at the wound, all time slowly around him as he 
considers what to do next. He promised someone he would not kill 
methos but that promise may now need to be broken. Zero then doubles 
over and place his hand on Methos back as it begins to glow green. A 
second later an intense blast of Matrix energy is fired out of him 
and into Methos scorching his body horribly while melting the metal 
around the immediate vicinity. A moment later in silence, Methos's 
optics switch off and he falls to the ground in Stasis lock. Zero 
looks down to Methos and sighs as his wings flap and e begins to fly 
slowly back to the Chivtrons base...
